00037 class DDWSpotter: public PrefixSpotter {
00038 
00039 private:
00040         DDWSpotter& operator=(const DDWSpotter& other); // no copying
00041 
00042         // track the last index that was valid--don't need to calculate
00043         // indices beyond this
00044         idx_t prevHighestValidIdx;
00045         
00046         // columns of subsequence stats
00047         SubseqStats *A;
00048 //      RefStats *yStats;
00049         
00050         // which indices are below the cutoff
00051         uint8_t *validityFlags;
00052         
00053         // distance values
00054         data_t *D;
00055         
00056         // max number of consecutive steps in horizontal or vertical direction
00057         steps_t maxWarp;
00058         
00059         // remove conflicts in possible subsequences
00060         void purgeAllOverlap(tick_t tstart, tick_t tend);
00061         void purgeInferiorOverlap(tick_t tstart, tick_t tend, data_t dist);
00062         
00063         // check if a subsequence is optimal
00064         bool sequenceLocallyOptimal(tick_t te, data_t dist) const;
00065         
00066         inline uint8_t idxValidAt(idx_t idx) const;
00067         inline void invalidateIdxAt(idx_t idx);

00069

00071         // Overrides from PatternSpotter
00072         // -------------------------------

00076         explicit DDWSpotter(const DDWSpotter& other);
00077         ~DDWSpotter();
00078         
00079         // getters
00080         data_t getCurrentDist() const;
00081         tick_t getCurrentStartTime() const;
00082         
00083         // getters using prefixes
00084         data_t getBestCurrentDist()             const { return bestPrefixDistance; };
00085         tick_t getBestCurrentStartTime()const { return bestPrefixStartTime; };
00086

00089
